reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one mentioning it's perfect for wearing with opaque tights. The dress receives positive feedback for its style, comfort, and softness, with one customer noting its thin material. Customers describe it as flattering, with one mentioning it relaxes and contours to the body, and appreciate its good stretch and beautiful color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a simple, but stunning dress this is!
items.body: What a simple, but stunning dress this is! I absolutely love the purple color and the body hugging fit of this dress. It stretches a lot, but it relaxes and contours to your body, for a snug and sexy fit. It's mid thigh and above, for a revealing look at your legs. The long sleeves add more of the pretty purple, or whatever color it is, to the dress. It's very comfortable on your skin, as far as the material goes. I've worn this dress with my favorite pair of silky and shiny nude pantyhose and pair of high heeled sandals and felt exquisitely feminine and sexy for the entire time I had it on. This is a quality dress, and it is definitely going to be worn often. Read more
items.author: Lenny S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and flattering!
items.body: This dress is so perfect for Fall! It's soft, but not super thick. However, it's slightly forgiving because it's ribbed. I got the forest green one and the color is absolutely beautiful! I believe this dress will get a lot of action this Fall. I love it! I'm 5'9 and it falls about mid thigh on me. So, it's not too short for those with longer legs like me. Overall, I like the quality of it and I feel secure wearing it. If you are on the fence, I would definitely get it, especially if you can catch it on sale. Read more
items.author: Amber N. Bennett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great staple
items.body: A really nice little dress for a great price! Worm to my nieces wedding. The length was perfect and short, but stayed down over my butt (I did wear tights) the whole night. The fit was nice, forgiving, and comfortable. I’m positive I’ll be wearing this often. Read more
items.author: H & M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress
items.body: Distress is definitely a must have perfect length doesn’t feel like it rides up. Super soft, ribbed material great stretch. The neck is a perfect length. Read more
items.author: Patricia lynch

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and Versatile
items.body: So cozy and beautiful! I have in the forest green and bright blue. The inside is sort of brushed so it’s like a light sweater dress. I wear a long plaid flannel vest over the green and a long black sleeveless blazer over the blue with fleece lined black tights and boots and they’re perfect. I’m not quite confident enough to wear without a layer over them but they are more forgiving than I expected. They are the perfect length for me to wear with opaque tights. And they don’t ride up! I’m thinking of buying another color. I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Elle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buying in every color ❤️
items.body: Love this color on my skin. I am 5’7 190 very curvy and this dress hugs every curve. Fitted and just the right length. Good quality and worth the money. Looks just like the picture Read more
items.author: Brooke

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Longer than pictured
items.body: Comfortable and soft thin material, but wayyy longer than the photo shows. Thankfully you can push it up a little bit but still an awkward look. Ordered a size medium and the fabric was slightly loose but very stretchy and forgiving Read more
items.author: Brian V.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit and decent quality
items.body: Fits well. Basic ribbed t materal...not too thin...comfortable Ordered a small. Fits perfectly Im 5 6 135lb Read more
items.author: mountain girl

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Brown, Deep Green, Blue, Deep Brown, Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Navy Blue, Dark Red, Red, Pink, Purple, Teal, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
